author: Sumit Bhattacharjee
text:
A Border Security Force (BSF) officer and a jawan were killed on Friday in an IED blast, reportedly carried out by the members of CPI (Maoists), when they were out on a bike patrol in the jungles of Koraput district in Odisha.

The incident occurred around 1 p.m. when a team of some 20 BSF personnel were returning to the base camp at Ramagiri from a search operation in Dandabari village of the district on 10 motorcycles.

The mine was placed by the Naxals in the dirt track.
title: BSF officer, jawan killed in Odisha
